title: Apple Pie
directions: In a small bowl, combine the sugars, flour and spices; set aside. Slice pealed and cored apples. In a large bowl, toss apples with lemon juice. Add sugar mixture; toss to coat. Set aside at room temperature for 1 hour.
Line a 9-in. pie plate with bottom crust; trim even with edge.

Toss cornstarch with apples. Transfer apples into pie pan, packing them down tightly. Pour up to 3/4 cup of juices from bowl apples were in over the apple mixture. Dot with butter. Add lattice crust to top.
Beat egg with one tablespoon water, brush over crust. Sprinkle with sugar. Bake at 400 for 75 minutes.
ingredients: 6 to 7 cups thinly sliced peeled tart apples
